messages.subject: 10mm Samurai miniatures..
messages.msgSnippet: Hello all, I have just received some 10mm Samurai figures ordered from Pendraken Miniatures and I am over the moon. The quality is so good that I am at last
messages.messageBody:
Hello all,

I have just received some 10mm Samurai figures ordered from Pendraken
Miniatures and I am over the moon. The quality is so good that I am at last
considering representing Sekigahara. The figures are excellent, although
they are in truth more suitable for the earlier wars, I have spoken to the
owner and he has told me that me that yari bearing infantry and cavalry will
be out before Christmas. The listing is below, and on the Pendraken site you
can see some of his work though sadly none of his Samurai. The downside, the
sashimono painting...


Renaissance (16th Century Samurai)
Each pack contains: 30 Foot or 15 Cavalry
(unless otherwise shown)
Click on name of miniature to see picture in a pop-up window
Code Description Price
SAM1 Seated General (1) £0.30
SAM2 Mounted Samurai Longbow £2.50
SAM3 Mounted Samurai Naginata £2.50
SAM4 Samurai Longbow £2.50
SAM5 Samurai Spear £2.50
SAM6 Samurai Katana Sword £2.50
SAM7 Ashigaru Longbow £2.50
SAM8 Ashigaru Naginata £2.50
SAM9 Ashigaru Aquebus £2.50
SAM10 Peasant Longbow £2.50
SAM11 Peasant Improvised Weapon £2.50
SAM12 Peasant Aquebus £2.50
SAM13 Armed Monks £2.50
SAM14 Sashimono mixed War Banners £2.50
SAM15 4 Guns & Crew £2.50
Army Packs Contain: 1xSAM 1,2,3,7,8,9,10,14
£16.00


Regards,

Joe




----- Original Message -----
From: <amphipolis@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 19, 2001 12:31 AM
Subject: [samuraihistory] Re: takuan


> Ι'm glad you liked my Musashi site.
> Here is a book reffered on Takuan:
> 1)Flashing Steel. Mastering Eishin-ryu Swordsmanship
> ISBN1-883319-18-8
>
> Also check out:
>
> 1) The Unfettered Mind : Writings of the Zen Master to the Sword Master
> by Takuan Soho, William Scott Wilson (Translator) (Paperback - March 1988)
>
> 2) Immovable Wisdom : The Art of Zen Strategy : The Teachings of Takuan
> Soho
> by Nobuko Hirose (Paperback - January 1993
>
> amphipolis
>
>
> --------------------------------------------------
>
> > At 20.07 17/12/01 +0200, you wrote:

thing

me

> an
